```{r}
library(terra)

coast <- vect("inputs/_ags_HELCOM_marine_area_2022_level1/HELCOM_marine_area_2022_level1.shp")
coast <- project(coast, "EPSG:3067")
plot(coast)

grid <- rast(crs = crs(coast), extent = ext(coast), resolution = 250)
grid <- rasterize(coast, grid, touches = TRUE)
plot(grid)

writeRaster(grid, "outputs/grid_250m.tif", overwrite = TRUE)
```
